trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ApplicationPartitionCollection"></xref> class is a read-only collection that contains <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ApplicationPartition"></xref> objects.
Determines if the specified <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ApplicationPartition"></xref> object is in this collection.
The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ApplicationPartition"></xref> object to search for in this collection.
`true` if the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ApplicationPartition"></xref> is in this collection, otherwise, `false`.
applicationPartition is `null`.
Copies all <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ApplicationPartition"></xref> objects in this collection to the specified array, starting at the specified index of the target array.
The array of <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ApplicationPartition"></xref> objects that receives the elements of this collection.
The zero-based index in applicationPartitions where this method starts copying this collection.
A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
The destination array is not large enough, based on the source collection size and the index specified.
applicationPartitions is `null`.
The index specified is out of range of the destination array.
Returns the first occurrence of the specified <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ApplicationPartition"></xref> object in this collection.
The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ApplicationPartition"></xref> object to search for in this collection.
The zero-based index of the first matching item.
-1 if no member of this collection is identical to applicationPartition.
A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
applicationPartition is `null`.
Gets an <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ApplicationPartition"></xref> object in this collection.
The zero-based index of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ApplicationPartition"></xref> object to get.
The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ApplicationPartition"></xref> object that exists at the specified index.
The index specified is out of range of the collection.
